title: Can no longer transfer server?
body:
as description, you can no longer buy a server change for rp? im unable to find it in the shop :/

so theres no way to change server?

replies.body: [**HollyMonster has been trying to supply updates**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/rlu6awv4-transfer-service-update) as soon as possible, but it looks like it might be another few weeks until the transfers are back up.
yes Miss Romy, i think we deserve 1 free tranfer chage,all this situation is so bad after waiting all this time.

Originally, we were suppose to be able to transfer Nov. 20th, but now they are saying due to technical bullsh*t we have to wait 4 to 6 weeks to switch servers again.

I'm telling you, we deserve atleast 1 free transfer change after all this waiting.
